# Akai MPD226 Presets

## Piano

Chromatic scale from C2 to D#7, with piano-like LEDs: light pink for white keys, purple for black. C notes are aqua for easy positional reference - likewise F notes are colored orange. On activation, LEDs turn green.

Made with MPD226 Editor 1.0.8 on Apple Silicon

## Bass Keys

Chromatic scale from C0 to D#5, with piano-like LEDs: light pink for white keys, purple for black. C notes are aqua for easy positional reference - likewise F notes are colored orange. On activation, LEDs turn green.

Made with MPD226 Editor 1.0.8 on Apple Silicon
